name: Angel of Mercy
oracle_text: Flying
When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: A song of life soars over fields of blood.

name: Angelic Page
oracle_text: Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

name: Ardent Militia
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: Knights fight for honor and mercenaries fight for gold. The militia fights for hearth and home.

name: Avatar of Hope
oracle_text: If you have 3 or less life, this spell costs {6} less to cast.
Flying
Avatar of Hope can block any number of creatures.

name: Aven Cloudchaser
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Cloudchaser enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

name: Aven Flock
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{W}: Aven Flock gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Just as each added feather steadies the wing, so does the flock grow stronger with each new member.

name: Blessed Reversal
oracle_text: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.
flavor_text: Even an enemy is a valuable resource.

name: Blinding Angel
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Blinding Angel deals combat damage to a player, that player skips their next combat phase.
flavor_text: "Their eyes will shrivel and blacken before faith's true light."

name: Chastise
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain life equal to its power.
flavor_text:
"Why do we pray to the Ancestor? Because She listens."
—Mystic elder

name: Circle of Protection: Black
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: Blue
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: Green
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: Red
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Circle of Protection: White
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Crossbow Infantry
oracle_text: {T}: Crossbow Infantry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"He can split a marshfly in two from halfway across the range."
—Onean sergeant

name: Demystify
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.

name: Diving Griffin
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text:
To outrace the griffin
—Kipamu expression meaning
"to do the impossible"

name: Elite Archers
oracle_text: {T}: Elite Archers deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: They fletch their arrows with the feathers of angels.

name: Elite Javelineer
oracle_text: Whenever Elite Javelineer blocks, it deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.
flavor_text: "Precision is frequently more valuable than force."

name: Glorious Anthem
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text: Each victory adds a new verse.

name: Glory Seeker
flavor_text: The turning of the tide always begins with one soldier's decision to head back into the fray.

name: Healing Salve
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

name: Holy Day
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"The day of Spirits; my soul's calm retreat / Which none disturb"
—Henry Vaughan, "The Night"

name: Holy Strength
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.

name: Honor Guard
oracle_text: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"It is not a choice I make, to have this guard. It is the choice of my people, and my duty to them."
—Oracle en-Vec

name: Intrepid Hero
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: A fool knows no fear. A hero shows no fear.

name: Ivory Mask
oracle_text: You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: Made from its wearer's hopes, the mask ensures that those hopes will be fulfilled.

name: Karma
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Karma deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps they control.

name: Master Decoy
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again.

name: Master Healer
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Her heart holds the pain of every soldier she's ever healed.

name: Noble Purpose
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: Fighting for the right reason is itself a source of strength.

name: Oracle's Attendants
oracle_text: {T}: All damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn by a source of your choice is dealt to Oracle's Attendants instead.
flavor_text: The future isn't sacred, but its speaker is.

name: Pacifism
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Peach Garden Oath
oracle_text: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
flavor_text:
"We three, though of separate ancestry, join in brotherhood. . . . We dare not hope to be together always but hereby vow to die the selfsame day."
—Peach Garden Oath

name: Rain of Blades
oracle_text: Rain of Blades deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
flavor_text: Some say they are the weapons of heroes fallen in battle, eager for one last chance at glory.

name: Razorfoot Griffin
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

name: Redeem
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to up to two target creatures.
flavor_text:
"Let me redeem my brothers both from death."
—William Shakespeare, Titus Andronicus

name: Rolling Stones
oracle_text: Wall creatures can attack as though they didn't have defender.
flavor_text:
"Trust me—the walls have more than just ears."
—Orcish spy

name: Sacred Ground
oracle_text: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield.
flavor_text: The land will never betray those who gave their lives for it.

name: Sacred Nectar
oracle_text: You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Over the silver mountains,
Where spring the nectar fountains,
There will I kiss
The bowl of bliss;
And drink my everlasting fill. . . ."
—Sir Walter Raleigh, "The Pilgrimage"

name: Samite Healer
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

name: Sanctimony
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent taps a Mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "The peasants labor for my profit. I approve."

name: Savannah Lions
flavor_text:
Even the brave are scared by a lion three times: first by its tracks, again by its roar, and one last time face to face.
—Somali proverb

name: Seasoned Marshal
oracle_text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.
flavor_text: She reads the battlefield like a map, always seeking the shortest route to victory.

name: Serra Angel
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: When she flies above the good, they consider themselves blessed. When she flies above the wicked, they consider themselves dead.

name: Solidarity
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+5 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"We must all hang together, or assuredly we shall all hang separately."
—Benjamin Franklin

name: Spirit Link
oracle_text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text: "I am bound to all my children. I share in their joys, I rage at their injuries."

name: Standing Troops
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: The less you have, the harder you fight for it.

name: Staunch Defenders
oracle_text: When Staunch Defenders enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: The key to winning any fight is simply staying alive.

name: Story Circle
oracle_text: As Story Circle enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{W}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Suntail Hawk
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Its eye the glaring sun, its cry the keening wind.

name: Sunweb
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
Sunweb can't block creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor_text: Sometimes the wings of fallen dragons refuse to give up the sky.

name: Sword Dancer
oracle_text: {W}{W}: Target attacking creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Most soldiers think of the sword as a weapon. In the hands of Zho monks, swords are also the strongest of shields.

name: Tundra Wolves
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"I heard their eerie howling, the wolves calling their kindred across the frozen plains."
—Onean scout

name: Venerable Monk
oracle_text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

name: Wall of Swords
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
flavor_text: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

name: Worship
oracle_text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
flavor_text:
"Believe in the ideal, not the idol."
—Serra

name: Wrath of God
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

name: Air Elemental
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Pray that it doesn't seek the safety of your lungs.

name: Archivist
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Words—so innocent and powerless are they, as standing in a dictionary; how potent for good and evil they become to one who knows how to combine them"
—Nathaniel Hawthorne

name: Aven Fisher
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Fisher dies, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: The same spears that catch their food today will defend their homes tomorrow.

name: Balance of Power
oracle_text: If target opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.
flavor_text:
"To empty your mind is to fill your grave."
—Lat-Nam teaching

name: Boomerang
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Returne from whence ye came. . . ."
—Edmund Spenser, The Faerie Queene

name: Bribery
oracle_text: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles their library.
flavor_text: In Mercadia City, loyalties extend only as far as your purse can stretch.

name: Catalog
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
Though those who study are as many as the hairs on an ox, those who succeed are as rare as unicorns' horns.
—Chinese proverb

name: Coastal Hornclaw
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Coastal Hornclaw gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Jamuraan farmers fear three things above all else: droughts, floods, and hornclaws.

name: Coastal Piracy
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "I don't like to think of myself as a pirate. I'm more like a stimulator of the local economy."

name: Concentrate
oracle_text: Draw three cards.
flavor_text: "The treasure in my mind is greater than any worldly glory."

name: Confiscate
oracle_text: Enchant permanent (Target a permanent as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that permanent.)
You control enchanted permanent.
flavor_text:
"It is better to take what does not belong to you than to let it lie around neglected."
—Mark Twain, More Maxims of Mark

name: Coral Eel
flavor_text: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.

name: Cowardice
oracle_text: Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, return that creature to its owner's hand. (It won't be affected by the spell or ability.)

name: Curiosity
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "You know that secret? The one that wakes you up at night in a cold sweat? The one you think no one else in the world knows? Well, guess what."

name: Daring Apprentice
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.
flavor_text: "I've seen my master do this a hundred times. How hard can it be?"

name: Deflection
oracle_text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
flavor_text: The golden rule of revenge: Do unto others what they tried to do unto you.

name: Dehydration
oracle_text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text:
"Cry to the sun and watch as even your tears forsake you."
—Acolyte of Marit Lage

name: Evacuation
oracle_text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: Which is more unsettling: the roar of battle or the silence that follows?

name: Fighting Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Scholars in their ivory towers call them "sharks of the sky." Scholars on the road don't call them at all.

name: Flash Counter
oracle_text: Counter target instant spell.
flavor_text: "So much for that bright idea"

name: Fleeting Image
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{1}{U}: Return Fleeting Image to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Beware lest you lose the substance by grasping at the shadow."
—Aesop, Fables, trans. Jacobs

name: Flight
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.

name: Fugitive Wizard
flavor_text: The College of Lat-Nam is often forced to expel students whose experiments grow too risky or too cruel.

name: Hibernation
oracle_text: Return all green permanents to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: The deep sleep of winter is not always restful.

name: Horned Turtle
flavor_text: It doesn't like having visitors . . . unless it's having them for lunch.

name: Index
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
flavor_text: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."

name: Inspiration
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards.
flavor_text: Madness and genius are separated only by degrees of success.

name: Intruder Alarm
oracle_text: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, untap all creatures.
flavor_text: One footstep among many is silent. One footstep alone is deafening.

name: Invisibility
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by Walls.
flavor_text: Verick held his breath. Breathing wouldn't reveal his position, but it would force him to smell the goblins.

name: Mahamoti Djinn
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

name: Merchant of Secrets
oracle_text: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.

name: Merchant Scroll
oracle_text: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Lat-Nam wizards trade knowledge on scrolls made of magic so they can better guard against thieves and spies.

name: Mind Bend
oracle_text: Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "nonblack creature" to "nongreen creature" or "forestwalk" to "islandwalk." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Phantom Warrior
oracle_text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.
flavor_text: It can pass through solid matter—but that doesn't mean it's harmless.

name: Puppeteer
oracle_text: {U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.
flavor_text: "Getting people to do what you want is merely a matter of telling them what they want to hear."

name: Remove Soul
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.

name: Rewind
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
flavor_text: "Let's go over this one more time. . . ."

name: Sage of Lat-Nam
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Within each device is a spark of its creator's soul. Within each sage is a lamp that awaits that spark.

name: Sage Owl
oracle_text: Flying
When Sage Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

name: Sea Monster
oracle_text: Sea Monster can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
flavor_text: It's easy to believe the monster is a myth—until you feel three hundred thousand pounds of myth crashing down on your ship.

name: Shifting Sky
oracle_text: As Shifting Sky enters the battlefield, choose a color.
All nonland permanents are the chosen color.
flavor_text:
Master the sky and you rule everything beneath it.
—Metathran saying

name: Sneaky Homunculus
oracle_text: Sneaky Homunculus can't block or be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
flavor_text: Keep watch only for the giants and you'll be eaten by the ants.

name: Spiketail Hatchling
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Sacrifice Spiketail Hatchling: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor_text: It dodges waves of water to prepare for waves of magic.

name: Steal Artifact
oracle_text: Enchant artifact
You control enchanted artifact.

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Telepathy
oracle_text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.
flavor_text: "Secrets? What secrets?"

name: Temporal Adept
oracle_text: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Of course she's at the head of her class. All of her classmates have disappeared."
—Tolarian renegade

name: Thieving Magpie
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.
flavor_text: Other birds collect twigs for their nests. Magpies steal jewels for theirs.

name: Tidal Kraken
oracle_text: Tidal Kraken can't be blocked.
flavor_text: To merfolk, pirates are a nuisance. To pirates, merfolk are a threat. To the kraken, they're both appetizers.

name: Trade Routes
oracle_text: {1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand.
{1}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: The wise, the righteous, the mighty—the merchant feeds them all.

name: Treasure Trove
oracle_text: {2}{U}{U}: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Wealth means power; the power to subdue, to crush, to exploit, the power to enslave, to outrage, to degrade."
—Emma Goldman, "Anarchism"

name: Twiddle
oracle_text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Wall of Air
oracle_text: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
When no falcons fly, beware the sky.
—Femeref aphorism

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"But high she shoots through air and light,
Above all low delay,
Where nothing earthly bounds her flight,
Nor shadow dims her way."
—Thomas Moore, "Oh that I had Wings"

name: Wrath of Marit Lage
oracle_text: When Wrath of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all red creatures.
Red creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
flavor_text:
"Marit Lage lies frozen in a glacier's heart. Still her dreams take form in our world, stealing the heat from our souls."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

name: Zur's Weirding
oracle_text: Players play with their hands revealed.
If a player would draw a card, they reveal it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.

name: Abyssal Specter
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
flavor_text: To gaze under its hood is to invite death.

name: Ambition's Cost
oracle_text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
flavor_text: "Knowledge demands sacrifice."

name: Bog Imp
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Think of it as a butcher knife with wings.

name: Bog Wraith
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: The bodies of its victims are the only tracks it leaves.

name: Carrion Wall
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Carrion Wall.
flavor_text: A wall built from the bodies of the enemy will never lack building material in times of war.

name: Coercion
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: "Human tenderness is simply weakness in a pretty package."

name: Dark Banishing
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"Ha, banishment? Be merciful, say ‘death,'
For exile hath more terror in his look,
Much more than death."
—William Shakespeare, Romeo and Juliet

name: Death Pit Offering
oracle_text: When Death Pit Offering enters the battlefield, sacrifice all creatures you control.
Creatures you control get +2/+2.
flavor_text:
"Kill them all and feed them to the new recruits."
—Crovax, ascendant evincar

name: Death Pits of Rath
oracle_text: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"Neither could I forget what I had read of these pits—that the sudden extinction of life formed no part of their most horrible plan."
—Edgar Allan Poe,
"The Pit and the Pendulum"

name: Deathgazer
oracle_text: Whenever Deathgazer blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
flavor_text: Your entire life passes before its eyes.

name: Deepwood Ghoul
oracle_text: Pay 2 life: Regenerate Deepwood Ghoul.
flavor_text: They feed on the living to stay undead.

name: Diabolic Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: The best ideas often come from the worst minds.

name: Drudge Skeletons
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
flavor_text:
"The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, they never surrender, and they don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."
—Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

name: Dusk Imp
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: It despises humans and squirrels and beasts and dwarves and cephalids . . . well, it despises just about everything.

name: Eastern Paladin
oracle_text: {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target green creature.
flavor_text:
"There is no worse enemy. His passion for death doesn't just border on insanity, it wallows in it."
—Southern paladin

name: Execute
oracle_text: Destroy target white creature. It can't be regenerated.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Any fool who would die for honor is better off dead."
—Cabal Patriarch

name: Fallen Angel
oracle_text: Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Why do you weep for the dead? I rejoice, for they have died for me."

name: Fear
oracle_text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text:
"The horror The horror"
—Joseph Conrad, Heart of Darkness

name: Giant Cockroach
flavor_text: Toren had stepped on a lot of bugs during his life, so he couldn't help feeling embarrassed when a bug stepped on him.

name: Gluttonous Zombie
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: Greed and gluttony led him to death. Now they are his greatest assets.

name: Grave Pact
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text:
"The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave."
—Crovax, ascendant evincar

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

name: Larceny
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
flavor_text:
Opportunity makes the thief.
—Roman proverb

name: Looming Shade
oracle_text: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: On darkness feeding, in nightmares breeding.

name: Lord of the Undead
oracle_text: Other Zombie creatures get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: Return target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "I confer with Death itself. What could you possibly do to injure me?"

name: Maggot Carrier
oracle_text: When Maggot Carrier enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"We do not suddenly fall on death, but advance towards it by slight degrees; we die every day."
—Seneca, Epistles, trans. Gummere

name: Megrim
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor_text: Memories cut from the mind can cut right back.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: What wizards fear most is losing their minds.

name: Mind Slash
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: "I can't think with all that screaming."

name: Mind Sludge
oracle_text: Target player discards a card for each Swamp you control.
flavor_text: When you get into the swamp, the swamp gets into you.

name: Murderous Betrayal
oracle_text: {B}{B}, Pay half your life, rounded up: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: Which hurts more: a sword in the gut or a dagger in the back?

name: Nausea
oracle_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: No fear. No sense. And soon, no lunch.

name: Nekrataal
oracle_text: First strike
When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

name: Nightmare
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
flavor_text: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

name: Persecute
oracle_text: Choose a color. Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards of that color.
flavor_text:
"Of all the tyrannies on humane kind
The worst is that which persecutes the mind."
—John Dryden,
"The Hind and the Panther"

name: Phyrexian Arena
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: A drop of humanity for a sea of power.

name: Phyrexian Plaguelord
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Plaguelord: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The final stage of the illness: delirium, convulsions, and death."
—Phyrexian progress notes

name: Plague Beetle
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: No one knows whether they were named for the disease they carry or for the speed at which they multiply.

name: Plague Wind
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy."
—Keld Triumphant

name: Primeval Shambler
oracle_text: {B}: Primeval Shambler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: His mind, like his body, is made up of the swamp's flotsam.

name: Raise Dead
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

name: Ravenous Rats
oracle_text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: Nothing is sacred to the rats. Everything is simply another meal.

name: Royal Assassin
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text: Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.

name: Scathe Zombies
flavor_text:
"They groaned, they stirred, they all uprose,
Nor spake, nor moved their eyes;
It had been strange, even in a dream,
To have seen those dead men rise."
—Samuel Taylor Coleridge,
"The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"

name: Serpent Warrior
oracle_text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.
flavor_text: A hiss before dying.

name: Sever Soul
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text:
"The mortal world is a grove of sweet fruit, and I am ready to harvest it."
—Fallen angel

name: Severed Legion
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: No one in Aphetto answers a knock at the door after sundown.

name: Slay
oracle_text: Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The elves had the edge in guile, skill, and valor. But in the end, only sheer numbers mattered.

name: Soul Feast
oracle_text: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: You are who you eat.

name: Spineless Thug
oracle_text: Spineless Thug can't block.
flavor_text: What it lacks in backbone, it makes up for in cruelty.

name: Swarm of Rats
oracle_text: Swarm of Rats's power is equal to the number of Rats you control.
flavor_text:
"Rats, rats, rats Hundreds, thousands, millions of them, and every one a life."
—Bram Stoker, Dracula

name: Underworld Dreams
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to that player.
flavor_text:
"In the drowsy dark cave of the mind, dreams build their nest with fragments dropped from day's caravan."
—Rabindranath Tagore

name: Unholy Strength
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
flavor_text: Such power grows the body as it shrinks the soul.

name: Vampiric Spirit
oracle_text: Flying
When Vampiric Spirit enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life.

name: Vicious Hunger
oracle_text: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Only the most ravenous soul feeds on the health of the weak.

name: Warped Devotion
oracle_text: Whenever a permanent is returned to a player's hand, that player discards a card.
flavor_text:
"The spirit of the devout is easily crushed by the loss of hope."
—Fallen angel

name: Western Paladin
oracle_text: {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature.
flavor_text:
"Expect nothing but scorn, flattery, and lies. And never turn your back on him."
—Northern paladin

name: Zombify
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it."
—Mystic elder

name: Anaba Shaman
oracle_text: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Just try taking this bull by the horns.

name: Balduvian Barbarians
flavor_text:
"From the snowy slopes of Kaelor,
To the canyons of Bandu,
We drink and fight and feast and die
As we were born to do."
—Balduvian tavern song

name: Blaze
oracle_text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fire never dies alone.

name: Blood Moon
oracle_text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
flavor_text: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.

name: Bloodshot Cyclops
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Bloodshot Cyclops deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor_text: After their first encounter, the goblins named him Chuck.

name: Boil
oracle_text: Destroy all Islands.
flavor_text: "When every reef is bared and every wave is dust—only then shall I rest."

name: Canyon Wildcat
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: In the warrior kingdom of Keld, the cats used in the hunt are prized for their tracking sense and ability to climb walls.

name: Cinder Wall
oracle_text: Defender
When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
flavor_text:
"The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours."
—Onean sergeant

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text:
"Pound the steel until it fits.
Doesn't work? Bash to bits."
—Dwarven forging song

name: Dwarven Demolition Team
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target Wall.
flavor_text: Foolishly, Najib retreated to his castle at El-Abar; the next morning he was dead. In just one night, the dwarven forces had reduced the mighty walls to mere rubble.

name: Enrage
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You wouldn't like me when I'm angry."

name: Flashfires
oracle_text: Destroy all Plains.
flavor_text: Dry grass is tinder before the spark.

name: Furnace of Rath
oracle_text: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
flavor_text: The furnace awaits the next master who would stoke the fires of apocalypse.

name: Goblin Chariot
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: The hardest part of his training is learning not to eat the boar.

name: Goblin Glider
oracle_text: Flying
Goblin Glider can't block.
flavor_text:
"What's got two arms, one wing, and no brains?"
—Ghitu riddle

name: Goblin King
oracle_text: Other Goblin creatures get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok. . . .

name: Goblin Raider
oracle_text: Goblin Raider can't block.
flavor_text: He's smart for a goblin. He can do two things: hit and run.

name: Guerrilla Tactics
oracle_text: Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

name: Hammer of Bogardan
oracle_text: Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to any target.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Hill Giant
flavor_text: Bent on a quest for blood, a giant can storm through a fort's wall as if it were nothing more than a picket fence.

name: Hulking Cyclops
oracle_text: Hulking Cyclops can't block.
flavor_text: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

name: Inferno
oracle_text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text:
"Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "Catch"

name: Lava Hounds
oracle_text: Haste
When Lava Hounds enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to you.

name: Lesser Gargadon
oracle_text: Whenever Lesser Gargadon attacks or blocks, sacrifice a land.
flavor_text:
"In some cultures, elephants are ridden by those in power. I don't think a mere elephant would even be noticed in Keld."
—Onean sergeant

name: Lightning Blast
oracle_text: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do."
—Selenia, dark angel

name: Lightning Elemental
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text:
"A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave,
He passes from life to his rest in the grave."
—William Knox, "Mortality"

name: Mana Clash
oracle_text: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

name: Mogg Sentry
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Mogg Sentry gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Tortured with magic by their masters, the moggs are enflamed by the smell of sorcery.

name: Obliterate
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"The enemy has been destroyed, sir. So have the forest, the city, your palace, your dog . . ."
—Keldon soldier

name: Ogre Taskmaster
oracle_text: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
flavor_text: Ogres learn how to smash stuff even before they learn how to walk.

name: Okk
oracle_text: Okk can't attack unless a creature with greater power also attacks.
Okk can't block unless a creature with greater power also blocks.

name: Orcish Artillery
oracle_text: {T}: Orcish Artillery deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
flavor_text:
"So they want to kill my men? Well two can play at that game."
—General Khurzog

name: Orcish Spy
oracle_text: {T}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library.
flavor_text:
"You idiot Never let the spies mingle with the orcish regulars after completing a mission. Now we'll never get them to fight"
—General Khurzog

name: Panic Attack
oracle_text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Sometimes everyone decides to go for help at the same time.

name: Pyroclasm
oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
flavor_text:
"When the air burns, only death breathes deep."
—Bogardan mage

name: Pyrotechnics
oracle_text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
flavor_text:
"Who says lightning never strikes twice?"
—Storm shaman

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

name: Reflexes
oracle_text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"Be as fast as lightning, and you will be just as deadly."
—Combat trainer

name: Relentless Assault
oracle_text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.
flavor_text: "Mercy? Mercy is for the playground, not the battleground."

name: Ridgeline Rager
oracle_text: {R}: Ridgeline Rager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: While armies battled across Jamuraa, beasts stalked the high places looking for victims.

name: Rukh Egg
oracle_text: When Rukh Egg dies, create a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: Called "stonefeathers" by many lowlanders, rukhs are thought to descend from a phoenix that sacrificed its flame for a body of stone.

name: Sabretooth Tiger
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text: To a sabretooth, all men are mice.

name: Searing Wind
oracle_text: Searing Wind deals 10 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"The first wind of ascension is Forger, burning away impurity."
—Keld Triumphant

name: Seismic Assault
oracle_text: Discard a land card: Seismic Assault deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Earth arms itself with fire.

name: Shatter
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact.

name: Shivan Dragon
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"I love lightning It's my best invention since the rock."
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

name: Shock Troops
oracle_text: Sacrifice Shock Troops: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: War is a conflict that determines not who is right—but who is left.

name: Sizzle
oracle_text: Sizzle deals 3 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text:
"Of course you should fight fire with fire. You should fight everything with fire."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.

name: Sudden Impact
oracle_text: Sudden Impact deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.
flavor_text: Most people know better. Goblins only know bigger.

name: Thieves' Auction
oracle_text: Exile all nontoken permanents. Starting with you, each player chooses one of the exiled cards and puts it onto the battlefield tapped under their control. Repeat this process until all cards exiled this way have been chosen.

name: Tremor
oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text: Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?

name: Two-Headed Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Two-Headed Dragon can block an additional creature each combat.
{1}{R}: Two-Headed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Viashino Sandstalker
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
flavor_text:
"Some believe sandstalkers to be illusions; those with scars know better."
—Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

name: Volcanic Hammer
oracle_text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

name: Wall of Stone
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: The ground itself lends its strength to these walls of living stone, which possess the stability of ancient mountains. These mighty bulwarks thwart ground-based troops, providing welcome relief for weary warriors who defend the land.

name: Birds of Paradise
oracle_text: Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Blanchwood Armor
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.
flavor_text:
"There's never been a dwarven smith who could match the marvels that Gaea herself forges."
—Elvish champion

name: Call of the Wild
oracle_text: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
flavor_text: From a whisper to a roar, the call is heard by all and refused by none.

name: Canopy Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

name: Choke
oracle_text: Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
flavor_text:
"One day we shall walk where once was water."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Collective Unconscious
oracle_text: Draw a card for each creature you control.
flavor_text: "The beasts of the wild are my senses. It is through their eyes that all knowledge shall come to me."

name: Craw Wurm
flavor_text: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

name: Creeping Mold
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
flavor_text: Mold crept over the walls and into every crevice until the gleaming white stone strained and burst.

name: Elvish Champion
oracle_text: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text:
"For what are leaves but countless blades
To fight a countless foe on high."
—Elvish hymn

name: Elvish Lyrist
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Each pluck of the strings breaks the hold of the unnatural on the world.

name: Elvish Pioneer
oracle_text: When Elvish Pioneer enters the battlefield, you may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: "Destruction is the work of an afternoon. Creation is the work of a lifetime."

name: Elvish Piper
oracle_text: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more.
—Elvish teaching

name: Elvish Scrapper
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Scrapper: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: "The stories tell of a distant time when machines overran the forests, destroying everything that lived. That time will not come again."

name: Emperor Crocodile
oracle_text: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.
flavor_text: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.

name: Fecundity
oracle_text: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.
flavor_text: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text: Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"The love of nature . . . is a furious, burning, physical greed. . . ."
—Mary Webb, The House in Dormer Forest

name: Foratog
oracle_text: {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Foratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Five hundred years to grow—barely a minute to eat.

name: Fungusaur
oracle_text: Whenever Fungusaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: Rather than sheltering her young, the female fungusaur often injures her own offspring, thereby ensuring their rapid growth.

name: Fyndhorn Elder
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}{G}.
flavor_text: "It is useful to be able to speak to the trees. But it is truly wondrous to be able to listen to them."

name: Gaea's Herald
oracle_text: Creature spells can't be countered.
flavor_text: The elves' battle cries cut paths through the Æther, guiding those who would stand in Gaea's defense.

name: Giant Badger
oracle_text: Whenever Giant Badger blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Disturb a sleeping badger and the snapping of your bones will awaken the countryside.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
Watching the spider's web
—Llanowar expression meaning
"focusing on the wrong thing"

name: Grizzly Bears
flavor_text: Don't try to outrun one of Dominaria's grizzlies; it'll catch you, knock you down, and eat you. Of course, you could run up a tree. In that case you'll get a nice view before it knocks the tree down and eats you.

name: Horned Troll
oracle_text: {G}: Regenerate Horned Troll.
flavor_text: Sword hilts jut from some trolls' bodies where wounds healed so fast that the weapons were trapped inside.

name: Hunted Wumpus
oracle_text: When Hunted Wumpus enters the battlefield, each other player may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: Just one can feed a dozen people for a month.

name: Lhurgoyf
oracle_text: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
flavor_text:
"Ach Hans, run It's the lhurgoyf"
—Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

name: Living Terrain
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.
flavor_text: Some warriors walk the earth. Others are born of it.

name: Llanowar Behemoth
oracle_text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Llanowar Behemoth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Most people can't build decent weapons out of stone or steel. Trust the elves to do it with only mud and vines."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Lone Wolf
oracle_text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
flavor_text: A wolf without a pack is either a survivor or a brute.

name: Lure
oracle_text: Enchant creature
All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
flavor_text:
"When the forest wants something, no mortal mind can resist her."
—Maro

name: Maro
oracle_text: Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: No two see the same Maro.

name: Might of Oaks
oracle_text: Target creature gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Guess where I'm gonna plant this"

name: Monstrous Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Get in touch with your inner monster.

name: Moss Monster
flavor_text: After the battle, an eerie silence gripped the forest. The losers' remains were lightly dusted with green.

name: Nantuko Disciple
oracle_text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Unanswered prayers are themselves answers.
—Nantuko teaching

name: Natural Affinity
oracle_text: All lands become 2/2 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
flavor_text: As long as the dryads are a part of the forest, the forest is a part of the army.

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"One touch of nature makes the whole world kin."
—William Shakespeare,
Troilus and Cressida

name: Norwood Ranger
flavor_text: The song of the forest is in perfect harmony. If a single note is out of place, the elves will find its source.

name: Plow Under
oracle_text: Put two target lands on top of their owners' libraries.
flavor_text:
To renew the land, plow the land.
To destroy the land, do nothing.
—Druids' saying

name: Primeval Force
oracle_text: When Primeval Force enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice three Forests.
flavor_text: It has germinated in the earth for thousands of years. Finally it wakes to the battle's call.

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Nature grows solutions to her problems.

name: Regeneration
oracle_text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
flavor_text:
"Why should death always have the last word?"
—Llanowar druid

name: Revive
oracle_text: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Even what is lost beyond recall returns when coaxed by a dryad's hand.

name: Rhox
oracle_text: You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
{2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

name: Rushwood Dryad
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: To a dryad, every tree in the forest is both a doorway and a window.

name: Spined Wurm
flavor_text:
"I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now that's a plan"
—Wandering mage

name: Spitting Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Sacrifice a land: Spitting Spider deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

name: Spreading Algae
oracle_text: Enchant Swamp
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it.
When Spreading Algae is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spreading Algae to its owner's hand.

name: Stream of Life
oracle_text: Target player gains X life.

name: Thorn Elemental
oracle_text: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
flavor_text: Rain from this storm leaves you pinned to the ground like an insect.

name: Trained Armodon
flavor_text: Armodons are trained to step on things. Enemy things.

name: Verduran Enchantress
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Graceful? Yes. Beautiful? Absolutely. Harmless? Definitely not."
—Fyndhorn elder

name: Vernal Bloom
oracle_text: Whenever a Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.
flavor_text: The sun breaks, the beasts stir, and the forest awakens to stand against its enemies.

name: Vine Trellis
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Nature twists knots stronger than any rope.

name: Wing Snare
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"We are the hands of the great trees, reaching out to ensnare what threatens their branches."
—Elvish hunter

name: Wood Elves
oracle_text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.

name: Yavimaya Enchantress
oracle_text: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Her roots connect her to the forest's wishes.

name: Aladdin's Ring
oracle_text: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"A good lamp will light your way. A good ring will clear it."
—Nervan, royal jeweler

name: Beast of Burden
oracle_text: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.
flavor_text: The heavier the load, the harder it works.

name: Brass Herald
oracle_text: As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

name: Coat of Arms
oracle_text: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)
flavor_text:
"Hup, two, three, four,
Dunno how to count no more."
—Mogg march

name: Crystal Rod
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Polished by a thousand waves.

name: Defense Grid
oracle_text: Each spell costs {3} more to cast except during its controller's turn.
flavor_text:
"A good deal of tyranny goes by the name of protection."
—Crystal Eastman,
"Equality or Protection"

name: Dingus Egg
oracle_text: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
flavor_text: Legend has it that the world was hatched from a dingus egg.

name: Disrupting Scepter
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.
flavor_text: "True power is controlling not only the hearts of your subjects, but their minds as well."

name: Distorting Lens
oracle_text: {T}: Target permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Eye altering alters all."
—William Blake, "The Mental Traveller"

name: Ensnaring Bridge
oracle_text: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.
flavor_text:
"Why build a bridge that needs to be guarded?"
—Elvish champion

name: Flying Carpet
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Woven from strands of griffin mane and pegasus tail.

name: Fodder Cannon
oracle_text: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Fodder Cannon deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
Step 1: Find your cousin.
Step 2: Get your cousin in the cannon.
Step 3: Find another cousin.

name: Howling Mine
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.
flavor_text: Legend has it that the mine howls out the last words of those who died inside.

name: Iron Star
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Forged by a thousand flames.

name: Ivory Cup
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Blessed by a thousand prayers.

name: Jayemdae Tome
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Knowledge is power."
—Sir Francis Bacon, Meditationes Sacrae

name: Millstone
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavor_text: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

name: Patagia Golem
oracle_text: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Its wings were only designed to be ornamental, but it learned to use them on its own.

name: Phyrexian Colossus
oracle_text: Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step.
Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus.
Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

name: Phyrexian Hulk
flavor_text:
It doesn't think. It doesn't feel.
It doesn't laugh or cry.
All it does from dusk till dawn
Is make the soldiers die.
—Onean children's rhyme

name: Planar Portal
oracle_text: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: These devices have been known to pull entire worlds through the Æther.

name: Rod of Ruin
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The rod is a relic from ancient times . . . cruel, vicious, mean-spirited times.

name: Skull of Orm
oracle_text: {5}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Though lifeless, the skull still possessed a strange power over the flow of magic.

name: Spellbook
oracle_text: You have no maximum hand size.
flavor_text: Knowledge knows no bounds.

name: Star Compass
oracle_text: Star Compass enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.
flavor_text: It doesn't point north. It points home.

name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in their hand on the bottom of their library in any order, then draws that many cards.

name: Throne of Bone
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Tainted by a thousand fears.

name: Urza's Armor
oracle_text: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
flavor_text: Urza protected his body well, but neglected his soul.

name: Vexing Arcanix
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Target player chooses a card name, then reveals the top card of their library. If that card has the chosen name, that player puts it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it into their graveyard and Vexing Arcanix deals 2 damage to them.

name: Wall of Spears
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike
flavor_text:
"A stick is your friend. A pointed stick is your good friend. An army of pointed sticks is your best friend."
—Onean sergeant

name: Wooden Sphere
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Strengthened by a thousand limbs.

name: City of Brass
oracle_text: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: Coastal Tower
oracle_text: Coastal Tower enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text: A beacon in the night, a dream in the fog.

name: Elfhame Palace
oracle_text: Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
flavor_text: The elfhames are the closest thing to "civilization" the elves allow themselves.

name: Salt Marsh
oracle_text: Salt Marsh enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
flavor_text:
Only death breeds in stagnant water.
—Urborg saying

name: Shivan Oasis
oracle_text: Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
flavor_text: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

name: Urborg Volcano
oracle_text: Urborg Volcano enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavor_text: Deep in the heart of Urborg lie massive volcanoes whose thick black smoke covers the land with perpetual darkness.

name: Urza's Mine
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

name: Urza's Power Plant
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

name: Urza's Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.
